abstract: Markets rose as higher oil prices lifted energy shares and speculation grew that the recession was easing.
snippet: Markets rose as higher oil prices lifted energy shares and speculation grew that the recession was easing.
lead_paragraph: Markets rose as higher oil prices lifted energy shares and speculation grew that the recession was easing. The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index extended its best quarterly rally since 1998 as investors remained optimistic, analysts said.

headline.main: S.&P. 500 Stays on Track for a Strong Quarter
